verses.text: This \w is|strong="H5030"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Habakkuk|strong="H2265"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Shigionoth|strong="H7692"\w*:\f + \fr 3:1 \ft Shigionoth is probably a musical term indicating the setting for the prayer.\f*

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w report|strong="H8088"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w*; \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w stand|strong="H3372"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w awe|strong="H3372"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w deeds|strong="H6467"\w*. \w Revive|strong="H2421"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*; \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7267"\w*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*!

\w God|strong="H8064"\w* came \w from|strong="H8064"\w* \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w from|strong="H8064"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w* \f + \fr 3:3 \ft Selah or Interlude is probably a musical or literary term; also in verses 9 and 13.\f* \w His|strong="H4390"\w* \w glory|strong="H1935"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w His|strong="H4390"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w His|strong="H3027"\w* \w radiance|strong="H5051"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sunlight; \w rays|strong="H7161"\w* flashed \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w His|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w His|strong="H3027"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* hidden.

\w Plague|strong="H1698"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* fever \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w His|strong="H6440"\w* \w steps|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7200"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w measured|strong="H4128"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* earth; \w He|strong="H7200"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w startled|strong="H5425"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* crumbled; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w collapsed|strong="H7817"\w*. \w His|strong="H7200"\w* \w ways|strong="H1979"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* tents \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w Cushan|strong="H3572"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* distress; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w were|strong="H4080"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7264"\w*.

\w Were|strong="H5483"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w Was|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w streams|strong="H5104"\w*? \w Did|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w rage|strong="H5678"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*?

You brandished \w Your|strong="H5104"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*; You called for many \w arrows|strong="H7198"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w* You \w split|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H1234"\w* earth \w with|strong="H7198"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w quaked|strong="H2342"\w*; torrents \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w swept|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* \w roared|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w high|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H5975"\w* \w places|strong="H2073"\w* \w at|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w flash|strong="H1300"\w* \w of|strong="H2671"\w* Your flying \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, \w at|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* \w of|strong="H2671"\w* Your \w shining|strong="H5051"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*.

\w You|strong="H1471"\w* \w marched|strong="H6805"\w* across \w the|strong="H1471"\w* earth \w with|strong="H1471"\w* fury; \w You|strong="H1471"\w* \w threshed|strong="H1758"\w* \w the|strong="H1471"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w in|strong="H1471"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2195"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Your|strong="H3318"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* save \w Your|strong="H3318"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*. \w You|strong="H5704"\w* crushed \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* stripped \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* toe. Selah

\w With|strong="H6041"\w* \w his|strong="H5344"\w* own spear \w You|strong="H3644"\w* \w pierced|strong="H5344"\w* \w his|strong="H5344"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w when|strong="H3644"\w* \w his|strong="H5344"\w* warriors \w stormed|strong="H5590"\w* \w out|strong="H6327"\w* \w to|strong="H7218"\w* \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* us, gloating \w as|strong="H3644"\w* though ready \w to|strong="H7218"\w* \w secretly|strong="H4565"\w* devour \w the|strong="H6327"\w* weak.

\w You|strong="H4325"\w* \w trampled|strong="H1869"\w* \w the|strong="H1869"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* Your \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, churning \w the|strong="H1869"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w trembled|strong="H7264"\w* within; \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w quivered|strong="H6750"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w*. \w Decay|strong="H7538"\w* \w entered|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w trembled|strong="H7264"\w* \w where|strong="H8478"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w stood|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Yet|strong="H5927"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* must \w wait|strong="H5117"\w* patiently \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w invade|strong="H1464"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*. Habakkuk Rejoices

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bud|strong="H6524"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w fruit|strong="H2981"\w* \w is|strong="H4639"\w* \w on|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vines|strong="H1612"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* crop fails \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fields|strong="H7709"\w* \w produce|strong="H2981"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* food, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w are|strong="H4639"\w* \w cut|strong="H1504"\w* \w off|strong="H1504"\w* \w from|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fold|strong="H4356"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w* \w are|strong="H4639"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stalls|strong="H7517"\w*,

\w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w exult|strong="H5937"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*!

\w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* is \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*; \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w makes|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w like|strong="H7272"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deer; \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w makes|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w walk|strong="H1869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heights|strong="H1116"\w*! \it For the choirmaster. With stringed instruments. \it*
